dataIdInfo.idPurp: The dataset contains fundamental information about dams in Switzerland which come under the direct supervision of the Swiss Confederation in November 2023. This includes data concerning the construction and purpose of the dams and their most important geometrical and spatial parameters and designations.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Water-retaining facilities are installations designed to dam or store water or mud. A water-retaining facility consists of a barrier structure and an associated reservoir. Installations for retention of bedload, ice and snow are also considered water-retaining facilities, if they can dam up water. Water-retaining facilities that meet the criteria of the current Water Retaining Facilities Ordinance (WRFO) are under the direct supervision of a cantonal or federal safety authority.

The service is in the Swiss coordination system CH1903+ LV95.

Data vintage: November 2023. The service is updated annually.

Consts.useLimit:
Open use. Must provide the source.

- You may use this dataset for non-commercial purposes.

- You may use this dataset for commercial purposes.

- You must provide the source: Swiss Federal Office of Energy (SFOE), Water Retaining Facilities, link to dataset

Important Note: This item requires an ArcGIS Online organizational subscription or an ArcGIS Developer account but does not consume credits. To access this item, you'll need to do one of the following:

Sign in with an account that is a member of an organizational subscription

Sign in with a developer account

Register an application and use your application's credentials

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
